text: The men's 4 x 400 metres relay event at the 2001 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Amsterdam, Netherlands, at Olympisch Stadion on 14 and 15 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| David Naismith Adam Potter Richard McDonald Matthew Elias ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Simon Kirch Stefan Holz Ruwen Faller Marc Alexander Scheer ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Oleg Mishukov Maksim Babarykin Dmitriy Bogdanov Yevgeniy Lebedev ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 15 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Nation !! Competitors !! Time !!
